markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Iron Repercussions](/Feats.aspx?ID=1665) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[tyrant cause](/Causes.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

Disobeying your [Iron Command](/Actions.aspx?ID=552) has lasting consequences. If an enemy refuses to kneel to you, you can deal [persistent mental damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) instead of normal mental damage. You must decide whether the mental damage will be persistent before your enemy chooses whether to kneel or not. The amount of damage is unchanged.
name: Iron Repercussions

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Iron Repercussions Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 118 2.0 Prerequisites tyrant cause --- Disobeying your Iron Command has lasting consequences. If an enemy refuses to kneel to you, you can deal persistent mental damage instead of normal mental damage. You must decide whether the mental damage will be persistent before your enemy chooses whether to kneel or not. The amount of damage is unchanged.
